entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, St. Alban's
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow and local blowing snow beginning this morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning then north 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6 except minus 11 inland. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 6 except minus 11 inland. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7 except minus 15 inland. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 7 except minus 15 inland. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Tuesday 10 January 2023
